title: Manage Project Resource Allocation
description: A project manager sees that a key engineer is overallocated for the next month and must reassign some of their tasks.

tasks.description: Run a resource utilization report for the engineering team.
tasks.expected_outcome: The report shows one engineer is allocated at 150% for the next month.

tasks.description: Identify the tasks assigned to the overallocated engineer and find another qualified engineer with available capacity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a suitable engineer who is only allocated at 60%.

tasks.description: Reassign two of the tasks from the overallocated engineer to the available engineer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the task assignments, resolving the overallocation.
